::: {#hero-heading} Thanks for stopping by. I am a Bachelor in Agrogenomic Sciences with experience in data analysis, particularly biological sequencing data. I am currently a fellow at C3 Idea, where I contribute to projects involving application development for the Virtual Mathematics Museum (MUMAT) at UNAM. I enjoy working with R as a programming language, especially for data analysis and designing tools such as web pages. I also use Bash for scripting bioinformatics pipelines.
Download My CV
::: #### About me ::: {.grid} ::: {.g-col-6 #about-me-1} My main interests lie in microbiology, microbiomes, and how they connect through metagenomics and biostatistics. I am the developer of an R package called Metaevomining, designed for genomic mining. I am passionate about microbial diversity, data analysis, and building biological databases. Beyond research, I enjoy contributing to science communication, agriculture, and education, as well as organizing bioinformatics workshops with RSG Mexico. #### Education **Escuela Nacional de Estudios Superiores León, UNAM** \| León, Guanajuato\ B.Sc. in Agrogenomic Sciences \| Graduated: 2020 ::: ::: {.g-col-6 #about-me-2} #### Work Experience **C3** \| _Virtual_\ Professional Practices\ **jan-2024** to **present**\ - Development of an app for The Mathematics Museum [MUMAT](https://mumat.matcuer.unam.mx/#intro). - Content reviewer for media. **Betterlab** \| _Irapuato, Guanajuato_\ Metagenomic Data Analyst\ **may-2022** to **may-2023**\ - Implementation of software for metagenomic data analysis. - Conducted courses on DNA extraction and PCR. - Developed a protocol for the discovery of natural products. ::: ::: {.g-col-6 #about-me-3} ## Lately ... ::: {.g-col-6 #about-me-4} ### Projects ::: {#project} ::: [See all →](/projects){.about-links .subtitle} ::: {.g-col-6 #about-me-3} ### Blog ::: {#blog} ::: [See all →](/blog){.about-links .subtitle} :::
